title: MLB Automatic Ball-Strike System Helper
description: Model created to assist teams and players in analytical decision making with MLB's ABS Challenge System.

title: League of Legends Position Classification
description: Cleaned and analyzed LoL data and used a random forest classifier to predict the positions players used.

title: Visualizing San Diego MTS Bus Routes
description: Used Pandas dataframe manipulation skills to logisitically map out San Diego bus routes.

title: Taylor Swift Lyrical Analysis
description: Analyzed Taylor Swift's lyrics and created model to recommend her songs based on similar songs from other artists.

title: Meteorite Statistical Testing
description: Performed permutation and hypothesis testing to see the significance of meteorite landing spots across the globe.

title: Retro Bowl Leaderboard
description: Created dynamic leaderboard that updated leaderboard rankings by linking multiple separate Google Sheet workbooks to one master workbook.
